XenotypeDef.label: Adapted Rabbie
XenotypeDef.description: Small in stature, but quick on their feet, xenobuns are excellent trackers, gatherers, and finders. Their nervous dispositions increase the liklihood of mental break and their smaller stature and demeanor slows them down in some tasks. Can be mistaken for true buns at first glace, but actually a xenohuman. Created by genemanipulating xenoanthropologists generations ago, this geneline escaped into the wild.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Small in stature, but quick on their feet, xenobuns are excellent trackers, gatherers, and finders. Their nervous dispositions increase the liklihood of mental break and their smaller stature and demeanor slows them down in some tasks.
